div.div: Map of future potential habitat (FPH) of Mussismilia harttii in a scenario of stabilization of greenhouse gas emissions (RCP 4.5) in the year 2100.
div.p: FPH includes regions with kept, new, and lost suitability compared with the present (CPH). Highlighted figures (A, B, C, and D) show the different areas in the M region: A) Ceará and north of Rio Grande do Norte States; B) South of Rio Grande do Norte, Paraíba, Pernambuco and north of Alagoas States; C) South of Alagoas and north of Bahia States; D) south of Bahia and Espírito Santo States.
